title: If I Were You, I’d Grab These Beauty Deals ASAP
description: From Pat McGrath to Tom Ford, these are the luxe finds you won’t want to miss.
excerpt: From Pat McGrath to Tom Ford, these are the luxe finds you won’t want to miss.
text: The sweet little luxuries of life are to be enjoyed now, not later. There’s no need to wait until the holiday season to stock up on your beauty favorites or discover soon-to-be favorites when the Nordstrom Anniversary Sale is right around the corner, complete with some of the best beauty offerings the naked eye can find. Nordstrom’s annual Anniversary Sale begins on July 12 and runs until August 3, giving customers plenty of time to strategize, add to, and refine their carts until then. Before you map out your game plan, there is a caveat: Early access depends on your Nordy Club status. Nordy Club “Icons” kicked things off on July 8, while “Ambassadors” joined the party on July 9, and “Influencers” dived in on July 10. Early access for all tiers ends on July 11, just in time for the sale to open to everyone on July 12.Navigating Nordstrom’s hotly anticipated sale, takes time, patience, and this expansive guide to sift through the hundreds of pages of discounts on brand favorites from the likes of La Mer, T3, 111Skin, Le Labo, Virtue, and plenty more. However, if you, like us, can hardly wait, scroll down to see what’s available to shop right now. HairThe easiest way to elevate your at-home blowout is by running a blow dryer brush through your strands for the ultimate volume and shine boost. Shark’s iteration takes it a step further, thanks to hot combs on each side to smooth as it volumizes. Plus, if you’re looking for hair growth devices and other essentials, now’s the time to grab them all on sale.Dyson Airwrap i.d.™ Multi-StylerNow 20% OffLiving Proof® Hit Refresh Perfect hair Day™ Dry Shampoo DuoNow 30% OffOlaplex Every Wash, Everywhere Healthy Hair SetNow 33% OffT3 AireBrush Hair Dryer BrushNow 38% OffFragranceChoose your fighter: Powdery white florals or woody vanilla with spices? Douse yourself in head-to-toe blooms with the fast-selling Gucci Bloom fragrance set, or opt for Tom Ford’s Vanilla Fatale for something a bit sexier and nocturnal. For those in between, Aerin’s candle set blends musks, rose, and aquatic notes in your home, while Tocca’s hand cream trio keeps your hands moisturized and aromatic on the go.TOM FORD Lost Cherry Eau de Parfum & Travel Spray Gift Now 29% OffAerin 3-Piece Votive Candle SetNow 40% OffTocca Garden Collection Crema Veloce Hand Cream Set Now 20% OffGucci 3-Piece Bloom Eau de Parfum Gift SetNow 20% Off Skin CareDeep in the pages of Nordy’s beauty sale section are everything you need to smooth, hydrate, and brighten your way to a supple, summer-ready complexion.111SKIN Allover Radiance Summer Set Now 25% OffPERRICONE MD Cold Plasma+ EyeNow 22% OffElement Eight O2 Eight Active Full Face Routine Skin Care SetNow 30% OffMAC Cosmetics Hyper Real Set Now 30% OffMakeupLongwear is the name of the game this summer, and reliable formulas from Estee Lauder, Anastasia Beverly Hills, and more work to keep your makeup in place for hours on end. html:
The sweet little luxuries of life are to be enjoyed now, not later. There’s no need to wait until the holiday season to stock up on your beauty favorites or discover soon-to-be favorites when the Nordstrom Anniversary Sale is right around the corner, complete with some of the best beauty offerings the naked eye can find.

Nordstrom’s annual Anniversary Sale begins on July 12 and runs until August 3, giving customers plenty of time to strategize, add to, and refine their carts until then. Before you map out your game plan, there is a caveat: Early access depends on your Nordy Club status. Nordy Club “Icons” kicked things off on July 8, while “Ambassadors” joined the party on July 9, and “Influencers” dived in on July 10. Early access for all tiers ends on July 11, just in time for the sale to open to everyone on July 12.

Navigating Nordstrom’s hotly anticipated sale, takes time, patience, and this expansive guide to sift through the hundreds of pages of discounts on brand favorites from the likes of La Mer, T3, 111Skin, Le Labo, Virtue, and plenty more. However, if you, like us, can hardly wait, scroll down to see what’s available to shop right now.

Hair

The easiest way to elevate your at-home blowout is by running a blow dryer brush through your strands for the ultimate volume and shine boost. Shark’s iteration takes it a step further, thanks to hot combs on each side to smooth as it volumizes. Plus, if you’re looking for hair growth devices and other essentials, now’s the time to grab them all on sale.

Dyson Airwrap i.d.™ Multi-Styler

Now 20% Off

Living Proof® Hit Refresh Perfect hair Day™ Dry Shampoo Duo

Now 30% Off

Olaplex Every Wash, Everywhere Healthy Hair Set

Now 33% Off

T3 AireBrush Hair Dryer Brush

Now 38% Off

Fragrance

Choose your fighter: Powdery white florals or woody vanilla with spices? Douse yourself in head-to-toe blooms with the fast-selling Gucci Bloom fragrance set, or opt for Tom Ford’s Vanilla Fatale for something a bit sexier and nocturnal. For those in between, Aerin’s candle set blends musks, rose, and aquatic notes in your home, while Tocca’s hand cream trio keeps your hands moisturized and aromatic on the go.

TOM FORD Lost Cherry Eau de Parfum & Travel Spray Gift

Now 29% Off

Aerin 3-Piece Votive Candle Set

Now 40% Off

Tocca Garden Collection Crema Veloce Hand Cream Set

Now 20% Off

Gucci 3-Piece Bloom Eau de Parfum Gift Set

Now 20% Off

Skin Care

Deep in the pages of Nordy’s beauty sale section are everything you need to smooth, hydrate, and brighten your way to a supple, summer-ready complexion.

111SKIN Allover Radiance Summer Set

Now 25% Off

PERRICONE MD Cold Plasma+ Eye

Now 22% Off

Element Eight O2 Eight Active Full Face Routine Skin Care Set

Now 30% Off

MAC Cosmetics Hyper Real Set

Now 30% Off

Makeup

Longwear is the name of the game this summer, and reliable formulas from Estee Lauder, Anastasia Beverly Hills, and more work to keep your makeup in place for hours on end.

PAT McGRATH LABS Luminous Legends: Eye Shadow Palette

Now 40% Off

Giorgio Armani Lip Maestro Lip Stain

Now 21% Off

Estée Lauder Double Wear Sheer Long-Wear Foundation SPF 19

Now 40% Off

Anastasia Beverly Hills Natural & Polished Deluxe Eyebrow Kit
